channel.title: Need help with operating a ring NEW

item.title: Need help with operating a ring NEW
item.dc:creator: @Praktikanten Praktikanten
item.description:
@Praktikanten wrote:

You could add a varible that contains how much time a player has left on the cooldown and then when a player disconnects/logs out you make this variable save in the character file so it’s loaded when the player logs in again.

Adding stuff to character file can be tricky, use the search bar and I’m sure you’ll find a tutorial

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with operating a ring NEW

item.title: Need help with operating a ring NEW
item.dc:creator: @pzykow pzykow
item.description:
@pzykow wrote:

So far when you operate the ring while in combat it boosts your stats up you can combine this with a super strength potion.
I think thats allright.
But if you relog you can cheat the timer and stack your stats up to endless.
So I want that the ring goes max to 133 when combined with super str pot.

	public void handleCruel() {

		if(c.isDonator == 1){
		if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.dfsDelay > 300000) {
			if (c.playerIndex > 0 && Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerIndex] != null) {
				c.startAnimation(263);
				Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerIndex].gfx0(265);
				c.gfx0(265);
				c.playerLevel[2] += (c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]) * .15);
				c.dfsDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();					
			}
		} else {
			c.sendMessage("My ring hasn't finished recharging yet (5 Minutes)");
			}if (c.isDonator == 0)
			c.sendMessage("Only Donators can use the ring's Special attack");
	}
}

item.source: Need help with operating a ring NEW
